why-me.title: Why me
why-me.self: I am just starting my journey as a developer – driven by a passion for technology, creative problem solving, and clean code. With strengths such as analytical thinking, perseverance, and teamwork, I quickly adapt to new challenges. I look forward to applying my knowledge in real projects and developing user-friendly applications as part of a team.

myProjects.title: My Projects
myProjects.description1: A simple jump-and-run game based on object-oriented programming. Help Pepe find coins and chilis to fight small chickens and finally the giant monster chicken.
myProjects.workProcess: How I organized my work process
myProjects.workProcessText: How do you keep your code clean and maintainable? Did you split the project into reusable modules or components? Focus on documentation, naming files, variables, classes, and tests.
myProjects.whatILearntText: As someone who always wants to learn new technologies, I particularly enjoyed this project because I was able to dive deep into a specific technology. Mention details like framework or language.

references.title: Need a team player?
references.subtitle: This is what my colleagues say about me

reference1.name: Sahra Mueller
reference1.quote: Claudia had to develop, format, and deliver content in the team. She is a reliable and friendly person.

reference2.name: James Rugman
reference2.quote: Claudia is a reliable and friendly person. Works in a structured way and writes clean code. I recommend her as a colleague.

reference3.name: Evelyn Marx
reference3.quote: She is a trustworthy team player and can handle time pressure. Structured work and clean code.

contactMe.title: Contact
contactMe.intro:
Interested in working together?
I am currently looking for permanent positions as a frontend developer. If you are working on projects where clean code, attention to detail, and user-oriented design are important, I would love to contribute and grow with your team.
Feel free to contact me regarding job offers or opportunities where I can make a positive impact.
contactMe.privacyPolicy: I have read and accept the privacy policy.
contactMe.errorEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
